EMailInformation.Subject: Your FocusPay User Credentials
EMailInformation.Message:
Dear @FIRST_NAME@,

Please find the login credentials of your @BRAND_NAME@ account. To login to your account, please use the following link:
@COMPANY_URL@

In case of any problems to open the link, please copy the url and paste it in a new browser window.

User ID : @USER_NAME_OR_USER_CODE@
Password : @PASSWORD@

You have ONE TIME option to change your User ID using the management portal or the POS.

We recommend following password management guidelines to ensure secure transactions. 
    1.You will be forced to change password immediately after the first use.
    2.Change password at least every @FORCE_CHANGE_PASSWORD@ days.
    3.Require a minimum password length of at least @MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH@ characters.
    4.Use password containing both numeric and alphabetic characters.
    5.Password cannot be same as any of the last @SAME_PASSWORD_USAGE@ passwords used.
    6.Consecutive @INVALID_PASSWORD_ATTEMPTS@ failure attempts to login shall LOCK OUT the user. User can try login after @LOCKOUT_TIME@ mins or contact administrator.
    7.Session shall expire after @SESSION_TIMEOUT@ minutes. The user is required to re-enter the password to re-activate the session.
    8.Your account will be disabled if left inactive for over @USER_INACTIVE_DAYS@ days.
    9.Do not use group, shared or generic accounts and passwords.
Any questions regarding the use of @BRAND_NAME@ account or if you need any additional assistance, please contact support.

Thank you again for choosing @BRAND_NAME@. We are committed to a long and fruitful business relationship.

Sincerely,

@BRAND_NAME@
Contact Sales at : @COMPANY_SALES_EMAIL@,@COMPANY_SALES_PHONE@
Contact Support at : @COMPANY_SUPPORT_EMAIL@,@COMPANY_SUPPORT_PHONE@

Disclaimer and Confidentiality Notice: Please do not reply to this email. This is a system generated email. The information contained in this message intended for the addressee is confidential and may constitute inside or non-public information. If you are not the addressee, please promptly delete this message and notify the sender.
